--- title: "arktax: Provider Taxonomy Codeset" subtitle: "The NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy Code Set" description: "The Health Care Provider Taxonomy Code Set is a standardized system of codes used to classify and identify health care providers and designed for use within the ASC X12N Health Care transactions." format: html: other-links: - text: NUCC Taxonomy Site icon: bookmark-plus href: https://www.nucc.org/index.php/code-sets-mainmenu-41/provider-taxonomy-mainmenu-40 editor_options: chunk_output_type: console --- ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: ### Key Points - **Purpose**: Categorize health care providers by their type, classification, and specialization. - **Maintenance**: National Uniform Claim Committee (NUCC). Updated twice a year, in January and July. - **Application**: Used in various healthcare processes, including: - Electronic healthcare transactions - NPI enumeration - Medicare provider enrollment - Insurance credentialing - Claims processing - Determining network adequacy # Overview The **Health Care Provider Taxonomy Code Set** is an external, non-medical data code set designed for use in an electronic environment, specifically within the ASC X12N Health Care transactions, including those mandated under [HIPAA](https://aspe.hhs.gov/reports/health-insurance-portability-accountability-act-1996 "Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996"). A taxonomy code is a unique, ten character alphanumeric code that describes a health care service provider's type, classification, and the area of specialization. Taxonomy codes are selected by the provider at the time of NPI registration. When providers apply for NPIs, the National Plan and Provider Enumeration System (NPPES) does not verify the accuracy of the selected taxonomy codes. It only validates that the codes exist within the current version of the code set. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` Interactive Provider Taxonomy Hierarchy ::: ::: # Code Hierarchy The code set is structured into 3 distinct levels: ::: {.panel-tabset} ## I: **Provider Grouping** **A major grouping of service(s) or occupation(s) of health care providers.** *Examples:* * Allopathic & Osteopathic Physicians * Dental Providers * Hospitals ## II: **Classification** **A more specific service or occupation related to the Provider Grouping.** For example, the Classification for Provider Grouping *Allopathic & Osteopathic Physicians* is based upon the General Specialty Certificates, as issued by the appropriate national boards. The following boards, however, will have their general certificates appear as **Level III** Areas strictly due to display limitations of the code set for Boards that have multiple general certificates: * Medical Genetics * Preventive Medicine * Psychiatry & Neurology * Radiology * Surgery * Otolaryngology * Pathology ## III: **Area of Specialization** **A more specialized area of the Classification in which a provider chooses to practice or make services available.** For example, the Area of Specialization for Provider Grouping *Allopathic & Osteopathic Physicians* is based upon the Sub-specialty Certificates as issued by the appropriate national boards. :::
# `arktax` The `{arktax}` package provides a programmatic interface to the Health Care Provider Taxonomy Code Set. The package includes functions to retrieve the taxonomy codes, hierarchy, and crosswalk data. ## Raw ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} arktax::taxonomy_raw() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 27,054 × 13 year version code display_name section grouping classification 1 2009 0 101Y00000X Behavioral Heal… Counselor 2 2009 1 101Y00000X Behavioral Heal… Counselor 3 2010 0 101Y00000X Behavioral Heal… Counselor 4 2010 1 101Y00000X Behavioral Heal… Counselor 5 2011 0 101Y00000X Behavioral Heal… Counselor 6 2011 1 101Y00000X Behavioral Heal… Counselor 7 2012 0 101Y00000X Behavioral Heal… Counselor 8 2012 1 101Y00000X Behavioral Heal… Counselor 9 2013 0 101Y00000X Behavioral Heal… Counselor 10 2013 1 101Y00000X Behavioral Heal… Counselor # ℹ 27,044 more rows # ℹ 6 more variables: specialization , definition , notes , # modified , effective , deactivated ``` ::: ::: ## Hierarchy ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} arktax::taxonomy_hierarchy() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 3,259 × 3 taxonomy_code taxonomy_level taxonomy_level_title 1 101200000X I. Section Individual 2 101200000X II. Grouping Behavioral Health & Social Service Provide… 3 101200000X III. Classification Drama Therapist 4 101Y00000X I. Section Individual 5 101Y00000X II. Grouping Behavioral Health & Social Service Provide… 6 101Y00000X III. Classification Counselor 7 101YA0400X I. Section Individual 8 101YA0400X II. Grouping Behavioral Health & Social Service Provide… 9 101YA0400X III. Classification Counselor 10 101YA0400X IV. Specialization Addiction (Substance Use Disorder) # ℹ 3,249 more rows ``` ::: ::: ## Changelog ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} arktax::taxonomy_changelog() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 599 × 4 code date change details 1 101200000X 2021-01-01 effective new 2 102L00000X 2007-01-01 effective new 3 102L00000X 2007-07-01 modified definition, source 4 102X00000X 2007-07-01 effective new 5 103G00000X 2007-01-01 modified title 6 103G00000X 2019-01-01 modified definition 7 103GC0700X 2007-01-01 deactivated use 103G00000X 8 103K00000X 2008-07-01 effective new 9 103K00000X 2016-01-01 modified definition 10 103T00000X 2007-01-01 modified definition # ℹ 589 more rows ``` ::: ::: ## Sources ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} arktax::taxonomy_sources() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 721 × 3 code source text 1 101200000X primary North American Drama Therapy Association, www.nadta.org 2 101Y00000X primary Abridged from definitions provided by the National Boa… 3 102L00000X primary Registry of Psychoanalysts published by the National A… 4 102X00000X primary The National Federation for Biblio/Poetry Therapy 5 103G00000X primary American Psychological Association, www.apa.org 6 103K00000X primary Association of Professional Behavior Analysts, www.apb… 7 103T00000X primary American Psychological Association 8 103TA0400X primary American Psychological Association, www.apa.org 9 103TA0400X additional The APA proficiency is Addiction Psychology. 10 103TA0700X primary American Psychological Association, www.apa.org # ℹ 711 more rows ``` ::: ::: ## Display Names ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} arktax::taxonomy_display() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 874 × 2 taxonomy_code taxonomy_display 1 101200000X Drama Therapist 2 101Y00000X Counselor 3 101YA0400X Addiction (Substance Use Disorder) Counselor 4 101YM0800X Mental Health Counselor 5 101YP1600X Pastoral Counselor 6 101YP2500X Professional Counselor 7 101YS0200X School Counselor 8 102L00000X Psychoanalyst 9 102X00000X Poetry Therapist 10 103G00000X Clinical Neuropsychologist # ℹ 864 more rows ``` ::: ::: ## Definitions ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} arktax::taxonomy_definition() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 874 × 2 taxonomy_code taxonomy_definition 1 101200000X Drama therapists are trained in the intentional use of drama a… 2 101Y00000X A provider who is trained and educated in the performance of b… 3 101YA0400X 4 101YM0800X 5 101YP1600X 6 101YP2500X 7 101YS0200X 8 102L00000X Psychoanalysis is a comprehensive, theoretical framework which… 9 102X00000X A medical or mental health professional who has attained crede… 10 103G00000X A clinical psychologist who applies principles of assessment a… # ℹ 864 more rows ``` ::: :::
# Medicare Crosswalk The [Medicare Provider and Supplier Taxonomy Crosswalk](https://data.cms.gov/provider-characteristics/medicare-provider-supplier-enrollment/medicare-provider-and-supplier-taxonomy-crosswalk) dataset lists the providers and suppliers eligible to enroll in Medicare programs with the proper healthcare provider taxonomy code. This data includes the Medicare specialty codes, if available, provider/supplier type description, taxonomy code, and the taxonomy description. ## Raw ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} arktax::crosswalk_raw() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 559 × 6 taxonomy_code taxonomy_description specialty_code specialty_description 1 101YM0800X E2 Mental Health Counse… 2 101YP2500X E2 Licensed Professiona… 3 103T00000X Behavioral Health & Socia… 62 Psychologist, Clinic… 4 103TA0400X Behavioral Health & Socia… 62 Psychologist, Clinic… 5 103TA0700X Behavioral Health & Socia… 62 Psychologist, Clinic… 6 103TB0200X Behavioral Health & Socia… 62 Psychologist, Clinic… 7 103TC0700X Behavioral Health & Socia… 62 Psychologist, Clinic… 8 103TC0700X Behavioral Health & Socia… 68 Psychologist, Clinic… 9 103TC1900X Behavioral Health & Socia… 62 Psychologist, Clinic… 10 103TC2200X Behavioral Health & Socia… 62 Psychologist, Clinic… # ℹ 549 more rows # ℹ 2 more variables: footnote , footnote_description ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} arktax::taxonomy_raw(taxonomy_code = c("101YM0800X", "101YP2500X")) |> dplyr::filter(codex::not_na(display_name)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 16 × 13 year version code display_name section grouping classification 1 2021 0 101YM0800X Mental Health Couns… Behavio… Counselor 2 2021 1 101YM0800X Mental Health Couns… Indivi… Behavio… Counselor 3 2022 0 101YM0800X Mental Health Couns… Indivi… Behavio… Counselor 4 2022 1 101YM0800X Mental Health Couns… Indivi… Behavio… Counselor 5 2023 0 101YM0800X Mental Health Couns… Indivi… Behavio… Counselor 6 2023 1 101YM0800X Mental Health Couns… Indivi… Behavio… Counselor 7 2024 0 101YM0800X Mental Health Couns… Indivi… Behavio… Counselor 8 2024 1 101YM0800X Mental Health Couns… Indivi… Behavio… Counselor 9 2021 0 101YP2500X Professional Counse… Behavio… Counselor 10 2021 1 101YP2500X Professional Counse… Indivi… Behavio… Counselor 11 2022 0 101YP2500X Professional Counse… Indivi… Behavio… Counselor 12 2022 1 101YP2500X Professional Counse… Indivi… Behavio… Counselor 13 2023 0 101YP2500X Professional Counse… Indivi… Behavio… Counselor 14 2023 1 101YP2500X Professional Counse… Indivi… Behavio… Counselor 15 2024 0 101YP2500X Professional Counse… Indivi… Behavio… Counselor 16 2024 1 101YP2500X Professional Counse… Indivi… Behavio… Counselor # ℹ 6 more variables: specialization , definition , notes , # modified , effective , deactivated ``` ::: ::: ## Footnotes ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} arktax::crosswalk_footnotes() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 50 × 3 taxonomy_code specialty_code footnote 1 251V00000X 61 (1) Medicare no longer enrolls this provider ty… 2 73 (2) This is an arrangement whereby immunization… 3 88 (4) Because the Medicare Provider Type Physicia… 4 208D00000X 99 (6) Medicare specialty code designation is for … 5 332800000X A9 (13) Medicare specialty code designation is for… 6 332B00000X 87 (3) Medicare carriers use Specialty Code 87 for… 7 156FX1800X 96 (5) Because the Medicare Provider Type indicate… 8 282N00000X A0 (7) Medicare specialty code designation is for … 9 282N00000X A0 (7) Medicare specialty code designation is for … 10 282NC2000X A0 (7) Medicare specialty code designation is for … # ℹ 40 more rows ``` ::: ::: ## Taxonomy ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} arktax::crosswalk_taxonomy() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 559 × 4 taxonomy_code taxonomy_description specialty_code specialty_description 1 101YM0800X E2 Mental Health Counse… 2 101YP2500X E2 Licensed Professiona… 3 103T00000X Behavioral Health & Socia… 62 Psychologist, Clinic… 4 103TA0400X Behavioral Health & Socia… 62 Psychologist, Clinic… 5 103TA0700X Behavioral Health & Socia… 62 Psychologist, Clinic… 6 103TB0200X Behavioral Health & Socia… 62 Psychologist, Clinic… 7 103TC0700X Behavioral Health & Socia… 62 Psychologist, Clinic… 8 103TC0700X Behavioral Health & Socia… 68 Psychologist, Clinic… 9 103TC1900X Behavioral Health & Socia… 62 Psychologist, Clinic… 10 103TC2200X Behavioral Health & Socia… 62 Psychologist, Clinic… # ℹ 549 more rows ``` ::: ::: ### Taxonomy Split ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} arktax::crosswalk_taxonomy() |> dplyr::select(taxonomy_code, taxonomy_description) |> tidyr::separate_longer_delim(cols = taxonomy_description, delim = stringr::regex("[\\/|,]")) |> dplyr::mutate(taxonomy_description = dplyr::if_else(codex::sf_detect(taxonomy_description, "Urban Indian Health \\(I"), "Urban Indian Health [ITU] Pharmacy", stringr::str_squish(taxonomy_description))) |> dplyr::filter(codex::sf_ndetect(taxonomy_description, "^T$|U\\)\\sPharmacy")) |> dplyr::mutate(n_desc = dplyr::row_number(), .by = taxonomy_code) |> # tidyr::pivot_wider(names_from = n_desc, # values_from = taxonomy_description, # names_prefix = "tax_") |> # dplyr::count(taxonomy_code, sort = TRUE) |> # dplyr::filter(n < 8) |> # dplyr::count(n) taxonomy taxonomy |> hacksaw::count_split( tax1, tax2, tax3, tax4, tax5, tax6 ) ``` ::: ### Specialty Split ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} specialty <- xwalk |> dplyr::select( .id, specialty_code, specialty_type, type_note, code_note) |> dplyr::left_join(footnotes, by = dplyr::join_by(type_note == note)) |> dplyr::left_join(footnotes, by = dplyr::join_by(code_note == note)) |> fuimus::combine( name = note, columns = c( "type_note", "code_note"), sep = ", ") |> fuimus::combine( name = note_description, columns = c( "note_description.x", "note_description.y"), sep = " ") specialty |> dplyr::mutate(.id = as.character(.id)) |> tidyr::nest(data = .id) |> dplyr::mutate(.id = purrr::map_chr( data, function(x) glue::glue("{codex::delist(x)}") |> glue::glue_collapse(sep = ", ")), data = NULL) |> tidyr::separate_longer_delim( cols = specialty_type, delim = stringr::fixed("/")) |> dplyr::mutate(specialty_type = stringr::str_squish(specialty_type)) ``` :::
## Sources - [Health Care Provider Taxonomy Code Set v24.0 (PDF)](https://www.nucc.org/images/stories/PDF/taxonomy_24_0.pdf) - [taxonomy.NUCC.org](https://taxonomy.nucc.org) - [CMS.gov](https://www.cms.gov/medicare/enrollment-renewal/providers-suppliers/health-care-taxonomy) - [ASAM.org](https://www.asam.org/docs/default-source/advocacy/taxonomy-one-pager.pdf?sfvrsn=b5e848c2_2) {{< pagebreak >}} ##
